subject: Technology
topic: Internet, Cloud Computing aur Digital Suraksha
question_en: What is the importance of cloud computing in today's world?
question_hi: आजकल में cloud computing का क्या खतरा hai?
A_en: Cloud computing is used for storing and sharing data
A_hi: संकेताओं, प्रश्न का उत्तर नहीं दोगे।
B_en: Cloud computing is used for hosting video games
B_hi: ग्लोब खेलों को भरने के लिए cloud computing का उत्तर नहीं दोगे।
C_en: Cloud computing is used for processing large amounts of data efficiently
C_hi: कामयाबाद के लिए cloud computing का उत्तर दोगे।
D_en: Cloud computing is used for developing and testing software applications.
D_hi: कामयाबाद के लिए cloud computing का उत्तर दोगे।
explanation_en: Cloud computing is primarily used for processing large amounts of data efficiently. It provides scalability, reliability, and cost-effectiveness in handling data and processing tasks.
explanation_hi: कामयाबाद के लिए cloud computing का उत्तर दोगे।
